name: TOGGL'
description:
TOGGL'   is a first person movement puzzle solver in which the player navigates and influences there environment traditionally through objects such as buttons and pressure plates. The Player uses there "Toggl' " ability to toggle objects on/off to create paths and allow them access to objects and certain paths of the environment.

The Game serves as a prototype for a university project.

Creators: 

Daniel Burke, Dylan Baker and Rayyan Gafoor.
